name: Consumer Electronics Show (CES)
description: CES is one of the largest tech expos globally, showcasing the latest consumer electronics, innovative technologies, and cutting-edge gadgets.

name: Game Developers Conference (GDC)
description: GDC is the premier event for professionals in the video game industry, featuring discussions on game development, design, and industry trends.

name: TechCrunch Disrupt
description: TechCrunch Disrupt combines a tech conference and hackathon, offering startups a platform to showcase innovations and compete in a hackathon.

name: Electronic Entertainment Expo (E3)
price: Price varies; media passes and industry passes available.
description: E3 is a major gaming expo where leading video game companies unveil their latest titles, consoles, and gaming technology.

name: AngelHack
price: Free to participate in hackathons; costs may apply for certain events.
description: AngelHack is a global hackathon series that brings together developers, designers, and entrepreneurs to create innovative solutions.

name: PAX (Penny Arcade Expo)
description: PAX is a series of gaming conventions celebrating video games, tabletop games, and nerd culture with panels, tournaments, and more.
